subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The San Antonio Spurs woke up last Tuesday to a new identity: They were no longer the best team in the N.B.A., the Western Conference or their division and they are not even the best in Texas.
snippet: The San Antonio Spurs woke up last Tuesday to a new identity: They were no longer the best team in the N.B.A., the Western Conference or their division and they are not even the best in Texas.
